name: Custom Labels for WordPress Posts
author: Narendra Sishodiya(narenin)

sections.description: Custom Labels for WordPress Posts allows you to add a more descriptive label to your pages/posts/projects, displayed in an admin column on the pages/posts/projects screen so that pages/posts/projects can be easily identified.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘custom_labels_for_wp_posts’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Start adding your page labels to pages/posts/projects.
sections.faq:
Why did you create this plugin.

I have created this to help site authors, admins, and developers easily identify pages/posts/projects on the All Pages/Posts/Projects Screen.

short_description: We can add a more descriptive label to pages/posts/projects, displayed in an admin column screen so that these can be easily identified.
description: Custom Labels for WordPress Posts allows you to add a more descriptive label to your pages/posts/projects, displayed in an admin column on the pages/posts/projects screen so that pages/posts/projects can be easily identified.
